testcase.name: verify that the response is successful when posting a bulk notification
testcase.system-out: * url baseUrl ............................................................. passed * configure headers = { Authorization: #(authorizationToken) } ............ passed * def bulkNotificationPath = 'accounts/staging/bots/fake/notifications' ... passed * def payload = ........................................................... passed Given path bulkNotificationPath ........................................... passed And request payload ....................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed And match responseType == 'json' .......................................... passed And match response == { success: true } ................................... passed

testcase.name: verify that the response is unsuccessful when posting an invalid bulk notification type
